Address.label: Address
Address.value: 3000 TANNERY WAY, SANTA CLARA, California, 95054, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Palo Alto Networks is a pure-play cybersecurity vendor that sells security appliances, subscriptions, and support to enterprises, government entities, and service providers. The company's product portfolio includes firewall appliances, virtual firewalls, endpoint protection, cloud security, and cybersecurity analytics. The Santa Clara, California, firm was established in 2005 and sells its products worldwide.
